message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,250,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering its potential benefits for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but $2,250,000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price. Considering the true value of this product and its potential to benefit your business, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
